form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: DEFERRED ACTION CASE SUMMARY, Form G-312

full_text: Screened by NARA, 7/13/2023 NAME ADDRESS DIST FILE NO GATHA, Dhankunvar Mohanlal c/o Mrs. S. K. Mithaiwala 13 A19 581 639 3023 Heirloom Wy, Sacramento, CA BIRTHDATE BIRTHPLACE NATIONALITY 1897 India India DATE AND MANNER OF LAST ENTRY EVER LAWFULLY LOMITTED FOR 12-2-78; B-2; New York City PERMANENT RESIDENCE Adj. Sec. 245; 2-15-72: PRESENT IMMIGRATION STATUS AND AVAILABILITY OF ANY ADMINISTRATIVE RELIEF BAL, NP-6 Overstayed nonimmigrant visitor--no administrative relief available. GROUNDS OF DEPORTABILITY Deportable under 241 (a) (2) as an overstayed nonimmigrant. ALL PERIODS OF RESIDENCE IN U.S. FROM TO 3-28-70 10-72 (Adj. Sec. 245 2-15-72; BAL; NP-6) 12-2-78 present PHYSICAL & MENTAL CONDITION REQUIRING TREATMENT OR CARE IN U.S. The SUBJECT is under the care of Dr. V. R. Desai, 2322 Butano Dr., /100, Sacramento, CA 95825. He has supplied three letters dated 1-21-80, 1-30-80, and 3-25-80, indicating the SUBJECT has spondylitis, Osteoporosis, osteoarthritis, glaucoma, and aphakia. The U.S. Bublic Health Service has advised that spondylitis is the hunching of the back due to severe arthritis; osteoporosis is a weakening of the bones due to cal- cium loss and that aphakia is the congenital absence of the lens of the eye. FAMILY SITUATION: 1. LOCATION OF SPOUSE. SONS. DAUGHTERS, PARENTS NAME AGE RELATIONSHIP LOCATION IMMIGRATION STATUS Nohan Lal Husband deceased Never in U.S. Kanti Lal Son deceased 11 Jannadal Son deceased II Vanmalidas Kotak Father deceased 11 Gomati Mother deceased # 2. EFFECT OF EXPULSION The SUBJECT has no immediate family left in India to care for her. She is now being cared for by her granddaughter, Mrs. Sohinee K. Mithaiwala, a nate uralized U.S. citizen, who is her closest living blood relative. She is 85 years old and in poor health, unable to care for herself. (Cont'd on reverse) NONPRIORITY STATUS: RECOMMENDED APPROVED District Director (Signature and Date) 3/31/83 Regional Commissioner (Signature and Date) DEFERRED ACTION CASE SUMMARY Form G 312 (Rev. 3-22-76)N UNITED STATES DEPARTMENT OF JUSTICE - Immigration and Naturalization Service
